## PropertyStyleSheetBehavior.(constructor)

Constructs a [PropertyStyleSheetBehavior](./fast-foundation.propertystylesheetbehavior.md) instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(propertyName: string, value: any, styles: ElementStyles);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  propertyName | string | The property name to operate from. |
|  value | any | The property value to operate from. |
|  styles | [ElementStyles](./fast-element.elementstyles.md) | The styles to coordinate with the property. |
